title: Why I can't confirm an usage of available summoner name?
body:
I want to start playing League of Legends and I try to install and run the game from like 4 hours, but I have only problems...
Inability to install, because of some c++ redistributable installing errors...
When I finally did it, then patcher died at the very end of installation (launcher stopped responding), I needed to run it again and patch some things again.

When I finally installed the game, registered etc. and I was hoping to finally play.... nope! Something doesn't work and I have no idea what. 

**Here's the problem:**

After launching and logging in, I am asked to choose summoner name. I've chosen name that consists of two words and space between them. Both words are basic letters that are found in ASCII, no special characters etc.

Now, when I press [Enter], the game says that: **[My Name Here] IS AVAILABLE**, 
and asks me: **"Are you sure this is what you want to display in game?"**

I click YES, but... nothing happens. Literally. I keep clicking YES and nothing happens. Any warning or error message, any explanation what I should do next, nothing like a message that the dame is declined or in use. Quite the opposite: it says that the name is available and I can use it!
http://puu.sh/smSHQ/acab364ef7.jpg

Why clicking YES doesn't work? 
If I click NO, then it allows me to change the name. But clicking YES doesn't do anything. 

I tried endless times, I tried restarting game, etc., but it's still the same. Game says that the name is available, but clicking YES doesn't do anything.

Why? How can I solve this and finally start playing? ='(

replies.body:
It sounds like you've gone through a bit of problems, and glad you were able to get the client installed.  As a heads up, the error you had usually happens to new PCs or outdated versions of windows that don't have [required products ](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=3387)to install.  It looks like you also updated your install to the Open Beta version, which is currently in testing.  There seems to be an issue at the moment where you'll get that message even if a name is not available.  You'll have to find another summoner name, or use the legacy client to create your name:

-  On the login screen of the open beta updated client, look for the "Launch Legacy Client" text at the bottom.
-  Or create a shortcut directly to the legacy client in your League Installation. Just look for "lol.launcher"

I hope that helps, and let me know if you have any questions!

Did this. Now it says the name is no longer available, even though everywhere else says it available! Why does the old client say my name is unavailable but nowhere else says so? The new client says its available, I just have the broken button problem.
